title: OPNsense Firewall Update Addresses Multiple Security Issues and Enhances Features

content.raw: The OPNsense project has released version 25.7.7, delivering critical security improvements and performance enhancements to strengthen enterprise firewall deployments. This update represents a significant step forward in addressing infrastructure vulnerabilities while introducing user-requested operational enhancements that directly benefit network administrators managing complex security environments. Security Vulnerabilities Eliminated The most notable advancement in this release is […] The post OPNsense Firewall Update Addresses Multiple Security Issues and Enhances Features appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
